div.p: JESUS. THANKS FOR MAKING THE BOOKS BEST
SELLERS. FINALLY TONIGHT THE TIP OF THE
DAY, A SALUTE TO GARY SINISE. HE BECAME FAMOUS IN "FORREST
GUMP" FOLLOWED IT UP WITH "CSI NEW YORK."
ALL ALONG HE'S RAISED MONEY FOR VETERANS, ESPECIALLY THOSE
WOUNDED IN IRAQ AND AFGHANISTAN. SEPTEMBER, THIS FRIDAY,
SEPTEMBER 13 HE AND HIS BAND WILL PLAY AT THE FESTIVAL PARK
IN FAYETTEVILLE, NORTH CAROLINA. THE PROCEEDS WILL BE DONATED TO
A HOME BUILDING PROGRAM CALLED BUILDING FOR AMERICA'S BRAVEST.
THE NEXT NIGHT, SATURDAY, SEPTEMBER 14, HE WILL BE IN
CHARLESTON, SOUTH CAROLINA, AT THE JOHNSON HAGOOD STADIUM TO
RAISE MONEY FOR THE INDEPENDENCEFUND.ORG WHICH IS
BUYING HIGH TECH WHEELCHAIRS, TRACK CHAIRS FOR SEVERELY
WOUNDED VETERANS. WE WOULD LIKE YOU TO GO TO HIS
CHECK OUT THE FAX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE.
